LinkItem.internal_link_text: Create a Shard Map Manager from a Federation Root
Create a Shard Map Manager from a Federation Root

ImageItem.internal_link_text: Clone the federation root to the shard map manager
Clone the federation root to the shard map manager
Migrate the existing app to use the Elastic database tools APIs
Migrate the existing app to use the Elastic database tools APIs

MarkdownBlockBase.code_block: USE FEDERATION CustomerFederation(cid=100) WITH RESET, FILTERING=OFF`

LinkItem.internal_link_text: conceptual overview of elastic database tools
conceptual overview of elastic database tools

ImageItem.internal_link_text: Switch out the federation members for the shards
Switch out the federation members for the shards

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: Perform a clone of the federation root to a Shard Map Manager. One can choose to put the existing Shard Map Manager on a new Azure SQL database (recommended) or on the existing federation root database.
Issue the SWITCH OUT against all federation members in a federation.

LinkItem.internal_link_text: Multi-tenant applications with elastic database tools and row-level security
Multi-tenant applications with elastic database tools and row-level security

MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: --Example of USE FEDERATION with FILTERING=ON USE FEDERATION CustomerFederation(cid=100) WITH RESET, FILTERING=ON SELECT * FROM customer
--Example of USE FEDERATION with filtering in the WHERE clause USE FEDERATION CustomerFederation(cid=100) WITH RESET, FILTERING=OFF SELECT * FROM customer WHERE CustomerId = 100
